directions: Place beef roast in crock of a slow cooker. Sprinkle taco seasoning over the beef; top with onion slices.
Remove beef to a cutting board and shred with a pair of forks. Return beef to slow cooker and season with seasoned salt.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon seasoned salt, or more to taste
title: Slow Cooker Shredded Beef for Tacos and Burritos
